titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Benjamin Stevens papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Resident of Hickory Grove, Michigan and later of Albion, Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letters from his parents in New York discussing family affairs and the possibility of their moving to Michigan; also a legal document giving power of attorney.
